attributes.comment:
Please DO NOT increase these fees for families adopting internationally. It is a
very expensive process already....a 66% increase is offensive! Please don't use
adopting families as a profit center! I understand costs increase over time but an
increase of this magnitude is truly outrageous. Many of us go through repeated
rounds of documents as we wait for int'l adoptions to be completed; in my case I
had to redo my entire dossier because of delays abroad, including my USCIS
documents, FBI checks, etc. Increasing the USCIS fees as proposed would be
another significant hurdle in the process that is already expensive and time
consuming. If you need to increase fees to reflect increased costs, make a COLA
adjustment -- but not an increase of 66%. Thank you.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
